item.description:
NOTE: I, Micki Eldridge, will not be in attendance for the November 16 Cribbage Meet Up :(
HOWEVER, Tom at Angelinos Cafe has the Cribbage bag of Boards and Cards. So whoever
shows up first can get it from Tom and start to play Cribbage. PLEASE! give it back to Tom
whoever is the last to leave that night. Thank you, Thank you, Thank you, and I will see
Y'All on November 30th.

Cribbage is fun and so are we :)

Come on down to learn, to skunk, to win, to lose and just have F*U*N* in general!

Food is great, people are terrific, and wait till you see the toilet bowl cribbage board ! ! ! Along with the four player, three player, two player, and 29 boards also ! !
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our cribbage boards at the ready ! !
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meetup: Welcome to Turkey Time !!
